import React, {useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import Topbar from '../Topbar/Topbar' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './VacanciesView.css' import axios from "axios"; import Pagination from "../Pagination/Pagination"; import ModalVacations from "../Templates/ModalVacations/ModalVacations" function VacanciesView() { const [modalVacations, setModalVacations] = useState(false) const [deps, setDeps] = useState([]) const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) const [postsPerPage] = useState(10) const lastPostIndex = currentPage * postsPerPage const firstPostIndex = lastPostIndex - postsPerPage const currentlyPosts = users.slice(firstPostIndex, lastPostIndex) const paginate = pageNumber => setCurrentPage(pageNumber) const department = useRef() useEffect(() => { const VacationsFinde = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/api/departments/') setDeps(res.data) const res1 = await axios.get('/api/user/') setUsers(res1.data) } VacationsFinde() }, []) return ( <>
